cherryheart co uk/p/copyright cherry heart designs round 14 4ch 2tr in same space *1tr in each st and each space to corner 2tr 2ch treble_crochet in corner space * repeat from * to * to start of the round slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of starting 4ch round 15 4ch 3tr in same space **1ch skip 1 1dc in next st *1ch skip 3 2tr 2ch 2tr in next space 1ch skip 3 1dc in next st* repeat from * to * up to corner space 1ch skip 1 3tr 2ch 3tr in corner space ** repeat from ** to ** to the start of the round 1ch skip 1 2tr in starting space slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of staring 4ch round 16 slip_stitch to corner space 1ch ** 1dc 2ch 1dc in corner space 3ch skip 3tr 1dc in next space 2ch skip double_crochet 1dc in next space *2ch skip 2tr 1dc 2ch 1dc in next space 2ch skip 2tr 1dc in next space 2ch skip double_crochet 1dc in next space * repeat from * to * up to corner space 3ch skip 3tr ** repeat from ** to ** to the start of the round slip_stitch into top of the 1st double_crochet of the round the next final round adds the small circles to the border using a join as you go technique by making a jss one stitch on the circle join each circle one by one in a random colour order when instructed below ✽ if you do not wish to add the dingly dangly circles to your edging replace the instructions 1ch jss 1ch shown below in bold with 3ch round 16 slip_stitch to corner space ** 1dc 1ch jss 1ch 1dc in corner space 4ch skip 1dc 3ch 1dc 1dc 3ch 1dc in next space *3ch skip 1dc 2ch 1dc 1dc 1ch jss 1ch 1dc in next space 3ch skip 1dc 2ch 1dc 1dc 3ch 1dc in next space * repeat from * to * up to corner space 4ch skip 1dc 3ch 1dc ** repeat from ** to ** to the start of the round slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the round cut yarn and weave in ends a sandra paul/cherry heart
